metadata.description: Asking classmates for help politely for first-class

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 你好! 我是小美。让我们学习如何向同学求助。

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: Say: 'Can you help me with this, please?'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: Can you help me with this, please?

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 太棒了! Friends help each other!

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: You can also say: 'I don't understand this. Could you show me?'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: I don't understand this. Could you show me?

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 好棒! Learning together is fun!
